title: Apple TV+ show ‘The Afterparty’ renewed for season two ahead of season one finale
content:
“The Afterparty” premiered on Apple TV+ earlier this year with season one finale scheduled to air this Friday, March 4. However, even before the last episode of the first season is released, Apple has just announced that the acclaimed mystery comedy show has been renewed for a second season on Apple TV+.

more…

The post Apple TV+ show ‘The Afterparty’ renewed for season two ahead of season one finale appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Even before the last episode of the first season is released, Apple renewed "The Afterparty" for a second season on Apple TV+.
